CustomField.formula: IF ( AND( ( AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL( Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c , 'Approval Required')) && NOT(ISNULL(Apttus_QPConfig__ConfigurationFinalizedDate__c)) && ( ISPICKVAL(APT_Overweight_Approval_Status__c, 'Approved') || ISPICKVAL(APT_Overweight_Approval_Status__c, '') ) ) || ISPICKVAL( Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c , 'Approved') ) , NOT(ISNULL(Apttus_QPConfig__ConfigurationFinalizedDate__c)) , NOT(APT_Document_Generation_in_Progress__c) , NOT(ISPICKVAL( Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c , 'In Review')) , OR( (APT_Use_Offline_Rates__c && Is_Exempted_Prod__c) , ( NOT(APT_Use_Offline_Rates__c) && NOT(Is_Exempted_Prod__c)) , (ISPICKVAL(Exempted_Product_Type__c,'StarTrack')) , (ISPICKVAL(Exempted_Product_Type__c,'Track Mail')) , (ISPICKVAL(Exempted_Product_Type__c,'Parcel Contract')) ) ,NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus_Proposal__Primary_Contact__c)) ) , HYPERLINK("/apex/c__APT_ViewRatecardBatchExecute?id="&Id&'&isRCCall=false' , IMAGE("/resource/APT_Create1", "Create"),"_self") , Null )
CustomField.label: Create Proposal
